main event: A 12-year-old boy reported observing an unidentified aerial object for about 15 minutes in Citrus Heights, California, on February 26, 1968.
interesting points: The observer was only 12 years old and lived near an airfield,The object was moving east and had a flickering flame-like trail,The observer noted that the object was a dull blue or gray color and difficult to see clearly,The object reportedly moved behind a cloud and reappeared,The observation was taken during daylight in clear weather conditions.
